t:
After serving his favorite
meal to her abusive
husband, she went back
to the bedroom and
started crying.



She wasn't actually sad,
she was just preparing for
the funeral.
c:
The taste of revenge is delicious.



Inspiration from Lamb to the slaughter.
#husband #abuse #plan #kill #cry #pretend
